attributes.action: Urge companies to reduce the amount of packaging on products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Companies wrap products in an unnecessary amount of packaging, from cellophane around bananas to vast amounts of cardboard on children's toys. If this was reduced, less waste would be generated, and the environment would be better served.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
